## UriResolver interface

Custom, app-specific URI resolver interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UriResolver 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resolveUri(uri)](./harp-utils.uriresolver.resolveuri.md) | Attempt to resolve <code>URI</code> to <code>URL</code>.<!-- -->If given resolver doesn't know about this specific kind of <code>URI</code>, it should return string as received. |
